channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Missed General Waste & Recycling Collection, 31st January
item.description:
The general waste and recycling bins are currently overflowing and unable to accept any more rubbish. This has been a recurring problem, with collections being missed for up to three weeks at a time. The attached image shows the bins filled to capacity for the past two weeks. This situation could potentially attract pests that pose a health risk to the residents in the vicinity.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dillwyn Close, Perry Vale, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole in very dangerous position on very busy road., 31st January
item.description:
The pothole is very large and deep and will cause a nasty accident if not dealt with soon. It has been there a long time and it is imperative that it is dealt with as a matter of urgency. It is a very busy road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Tudor Way, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken tactikes and holes by the zebra crossing, 31st January
item.description:
The footway by the zebra crossing has been damaged for several months and now after heavy rain it is quite dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66-148, Brecknock Road, Holloway, Greater London

item.title: 3 potholes in road, 31st January

item.title: Car dumped outside my home with no tax nobody knows who it belongs too, 31st January
item.description:
Car dumped with no tax outside our home it has been parked for two weeks now and nobody in street knows whoâ€™s car it is. We keep getting cars dumped in our road for weeks or days on end and it makes parking hard

item.title: Mattress Dumped on Grass Verge, 31st January
item.description:
Double bed mattress dumped on grass verge of the busy dual carriageway going towards the fish roundabout. This section of road also had a lot of litter and plastic building sheets scattered along the grass verge and dangerous to vehicles if the plastic sheets get blow into the road and vehicles. Please arrange to inspect the plastic sheets caught in bushes on grass verge and remove mattress
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bronze Age Way, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple Pot Holes and Poor Surface, 31st January
item.description:
There are a number of pot holes on section of road between the horse roundabout and the Travel Lodge roundabout. The surface of road is also poor. This is a heavily used section of road by large trucks and other vehicles. Please arrange to inspect the multiple potholes and poor surface. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Picardy Manorway, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose Kerbstone, 31st January
